no.hig.hers.ludoclient

Class ClientMainUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.hig.hers.ludoclient.ClientMainUIController

  • public class ClientMainUIController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main controller for handling all of the main GUI features. That includes the buttons in the "Main" tab as well as the list of group chats and the button for creating new group chats
    Author:
    Daniel on 05.11.2015

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Creates the labels for where the top ten lists are shown Internationalization of all the buttons and labels aswell when the controller is made

      • newGameButtonPressed

        void newGameButtonPressed()
        When button is pressed a "creategame" message is sent to server. And the button is disabled because you can only be the host of one game

      • openNewGameButton

        public void openNewGameButton()
        Removes the disable set when making a new game

      • createChatButtonPressed

        void createChatButtonPressed()
        Creates a TextInputDialog, asking the user to type a name for the new chat room. It then creates the new chat room by sending a message to the server with the name. Lastly, joins the new chat.

      • queueButtonPressed

        void queueButtonPressed()
        Sends a "queue" message to the server and disables the button

      • joinChat

        void joinChat()
        Joins the selected chat in the groupChatList

      • hideChat

        void hideChat()
        Hides the chatOverlay

      • createLabels

        public void createLabels()
        Setting up the Labels, first by creating new Labels, then setting the constraints, finally adding them to the GridPane.

      • setTopTenPlayed

        public void setTopTenPlayed(java.lang.String[][] played)
        Sets the Top ten played list text
        Parameters:
        played - The String 2D array with the new played list

      • setTopTenWon

        public void setTopTenWon(java.lang.String[][] won)
        Sets the Top ten won list text
        Parameters:
        won - The String 2D array with the new won list

        Parameters:

        public void openQueue()

      • setScores

        public void setScores(java.lang.String won,
                      java.lang.String played)
        Sets the score of the player in the "Main" tab
        Parameters:
        won - games by the user
        played - games by the user
